sourcesContent:
<template>
    <TreeChart :json="data" :class="{landscape: landscape.length}" @click-node="clickNode"/>
</template>

<script>
  import TreeChart from "@/components/TreeChart";

  export default {
    name: 'app',
    components: {
      TreeChart
    },
    data() {
      const data = [
        {
          name: 'A',
          description: 'This is a description of A',
          parent: ''
        },
        {
          name: 'B',
          description: 'This is a description of B',
          parent: 'A'
        },
        {
          name: 'C',
          description: 'This is a description of C',
          parent: 'A'
        },
        {
          name: 'D',
          description: 'This is a description of D',
          parent: 'A'
        },
        {
          name: 'B-1',
          description: 'This is a description of B-1',
          parent: 'B'
        },
        {
          name: 'B-2',
          description: 'This is a description of B-2',
          parent: 'B'
        },
        {
          name: 'B-3',
          description: 'This is a description of B-3',
          parent: 'B'
        }
      ];
      const formattedData = this.nest(data);
      return {
        landscape: [],
        data: {
          name: formattedData[0].name,
          description: formattedData[0].description,
          class: ["rootNode"],
          children: formattedData[0].children
        }
      };
    },
    methods: {
      clickNode: function (node) {
        this.$notify({
          group: 'notifications',
          title: node.name,
          text: node.description,
          close: true,
        });
      },
     close: function(){this.$notify({group: 'notifications', clean: true})},
      nest(items, name = '', link = 'parent') {
        return items.filter(item => item[link] === name)
            .map(item => ({
              name: item.name,
              description: item.description,
              children: this.nest(items, item.name)
            }));
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style>
    #app {
        font-family: 'Avenir', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
        text-align: center;
        color: #2c3e50;
        margin-top: 60px;
    }

    #app .avat {
        border-radius: 2em;
        border-width: 2px;
    }

    #app .name {
        font-weight: 700;
    }

    #app .rootNode .name {
        color: red;
    }

    .foot {
        position: fixed;
        left: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        background: #333;
        padding: 24px;
        overflow: hidden;
        color: #999;
        font-size: 14px;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .foot a {
        color: #fff;
        margin: 0 .5em
    }
</style>
